org.beanio.internal.parser.format.xml
Class XmlAttributeField

java.lang.Object
  org.beanio.internal.parser.format.xml.XmlFieldFormat
      org.beanio.internal.parser.format.xml.XmlAttributeField
All Implemented Interfaces:
FieldFormat, XmlNode
public class XmlAttributeField
extends XmlFieldFormat

A FieldFormat for a field in an XML formatted stream parsed as an attribute of its parent.

Since:
2.0
Author:
Kevin Seim

Description copied from interface: XmlNode
